scripts.copy: cp -rf src/resources dist && cp src/manifest.json dist && cp -rf src/scripts dist
scripts.build-js: mkdir -p dist/html && mkdir -p dist/js && mkdir -p dist/css && pug src/html/popup.pug -o dist/html/ && uglifyjs src/js/popup.js -m -o dist/js/popup.min.js && stylus src/css/stylesheet.styl -o dist/css/stylesheet.css && npm run copy
scripts.clean-build: npm run clean && npm run build-js
scripts.deploy: npm run build-js && npm run zip
